live_trade_table.exchange: String defining the exchange being used
live_trade_table.trade_type: String of the type of trade: BUY / SELL / BUY_STOP / SELL_STOP
live_trade_table.stop_loss: Float of the stop loss value
live_trade_table.take_profit: Float of the take profit value
live_trade_table.status: String of the status: CANCELLED / PLACED
live_trade_table.order_id: String of a unique identifier for the order

paper_trade_table.exchange: String defining the exchange being used
paper_trade_table.trade_type: String of the type of trade: BUY / SELL / BUY_STOP / SELL_STOP
paper_trade_table.stop_loss: Float of the stop loss value
paper_trade_table.take_profit: Float of the take profit value
paper_trade_table.status: String of the status: CANCELLED / PLACED
paper_trade_table.order_id: String of a unique identifier for the order
